subtitle: A delicious way to serve cauliflower and carrots.

method.text: Place the vegetables in a steamer over boiling water. Cook for 7-10 min, depending on size of vegetables. 2 min before the end of cooking, stir in the lemon rind.
Mash the butter with the herbs and black pepper. Form into small rounds.
Just before serving: Put the rounds of herby butter onto the vegetables and sprinkle on a little nutmeg.

title: Steamed citrus vegetables
